item.title: Wash hands often with soap & water for 20 seconds.
Wipe down desks and countertops after use.
Leave one meter between you & your neighbour.
Cover your mouth & nose with a tissue, sleeve or elbow while coughing or sneezing.
Stay home if you are feeling unwell!
We highly encourage the use of face coverings, especially in instances where physical distancing is not possible.
